name: xmlUpdate
description: Updates a part of an XML document (elements, attributes, or nodes) with a new value.

params.name: node
params.description: The XML node in which to update a value

params.name: xpath
params.description: XPath expression to locate the XML fragment to update

examples.title: Update a specified node (Script syntax)
examples.description: Updates the text node of root in a simple XML document
examples.result:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<root><item id="1">Item 1</item><item id="2">Item 2</item><item id="3">Item 3</item>hello world!</root>
